ComicInfo.Summary: THIS IS IT! THE FINALE YOU’VE BEEN WAITING FOR! The shape-shifter has won -- the Meta Legion lies in tatters after the robot invasion of Manhattan. When all hope appears lost, rookie housewife Eve White is pressed into action...but will it be enough? Don’t miss this thrilling conclusion, as SUPURBIA is rocked by a death in the family... Find out what goes down when the capes come off with rising star writer Grace Randolph (Marvel’s NATION X, HER-OES) and hot new artist Russell Dauterman.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 22:19:41. [CVDB339805]
ComicInfo.Characters: Agent Twilight, Alexis Fritsche, Batu, Cosmic Champion, Eli Metzger, Eve White, Hella, Jeremy Metzger, Mike Smith, Night Fox, Robert White, Ruth Smith, Sara Metzger, Sovereign, Tia Jenkins, Zari Jenkins
